title: ASP.NET 5 MVC6 Pager
description: This library provides data-paging functionality and pager UI for ASP.NET 5 MVC6 projects.

packOptions.summary: This library provides data-paging functionality and pager UI for ASP.NET 5 MVC6 projects.
packOptions.releaseNotes: In this realse, the core framework is updated to ASP.NET Core RC2. What's more, the usage of the library has a breaking change. Please visit the demo page to learn more.
